originalSteps.title: Initial Access
originalSteps.description: Enter the four-digit code on the keypad. The order of entry does not matter.

originalSteps.title: Troubleshooting: Locked Screen
originalSteps.description: If the screen locks up or the numbers are entered incorrectly, repeatedly press any key on the keypad until the screen goes blank and a red light blinks. This indicates the system has reset.

originalSteps.title: Reaccessing after Reset
originalSteps.description: Once the screen is blank and the red light is blinking, re-enter the four-digit code to access the system.

originalSteps.title: Successful Entry Confirmation
originalSteps.description: The system should now be unlocked and grant you access.
